<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);

		var index=$(this).index()+1;

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);

		var index=$(this).index()+1;

<script type="text/javascript">
String.prototype.format = function() {
	var arg = arguments;
	return this.replace(/\{(\d+)\}/g, function(i, m) {
	return arg[m];
	});
}

$(document).ready(function() {
	$("#keyword").keydown(function(event) {
		if (event.keyCode == 13) {
			searchKeyword();
		}
	});

/*	$("#keyword").autocomplete(citiesData,
	{
		//caption: "ÊäÈëÖÐÎÄ/È«Æ´/¼òÆ´/Ó¢ÎÄ£¬Ê¹ÓÃ¡ü¡ý¿ÉÒÔÑ¡Ôñ",

	$("#submit").click(function() {
		searchKeyword();
	});
});

function searchKeyword()
{
	var keyword = $.trim($("#keyword").val());
	if (keyword == '') {
		$("#keyword").focus();
		return false;
	}else if(keyword.indexOf("www.") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cn") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".com") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".net") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cc") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".la") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cm") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".html") >-1){
		alert('ËÑË÷×Ö·û´®²»ºÏ·¨!');
		return false;
	}else{}	
	var url = '/plus/search_new.html?template=list&keyword=' + keyword;
	location.href = url;
}
</script>

 $backToTopFuns = function() {
	var st = $(document).scrollTop() || document.body.scrollTop;
	if(st > baidutop){

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $(".header").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 5;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	//var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	//var top = scrollTop + 30;
	//fads.css("top", top+"px");
	fads.css("top", "127px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();
fixAdPosY();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "127px"
	});
}

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

function hide()  
{   
	document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
	document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

function sCookie(c_name,value,expiredays){
	var exdate = new Date();
	exdate.setSeconds(exdate.getSeconds()+expiredays*3600);
	document.cookie = c_name + "=" +escape(value) + (";expires=" + exdate.toGMTString()+";path=/");
}
function gCookie(c_name){
 if (document.cookie.length > 0){
	c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=")
	if (c_start != -1){
		c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
	    c_end   = document.cookie.indexOf(";",c_start);
	    if (c_end == -1){
			c_end = document.cookie.length;
		}
		return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start,c_end));
	 }
 }
	return null
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

                <h2 class="title">Í¬Àà¸üÐÂ</h2>
                <ul>
                    <li>

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

           	<a href="http://news.52pk.com/hwnews/" target="_blank">È«Çò×ÊÑ¶</a>

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
function onSearch(){
	webpage = $('input.webp:checked').val();
        keyword = $('#header_key').val();
        if(keyword != ''){
                if(webpage == 2){//ÍøÒ³ÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/p'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else if(webpage == 1){//ÍøÂçÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/s'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else{//ÊÖÓÎ
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/i'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }
                window.location.href = hrefs;
        }else{
                alert('ÇëÊäÈë¹Ø¼ü×Ö!');
        }	
        return false;
};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#head").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 20;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "180px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "180px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script language="javascript">
$(document).ready(function(){
	UClient.ucInit(1,2);
	UClient.checkLogin();
});
function login(){
	var name = $('#username').val();
	var passwd = $('#passwd').val();
	UClient.Login(name,passwd);
}

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

<script>
var agt = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
var is_ie = ((agt.indexOf("msie") != -1) && (agt.indexOf("opera") == -1));
var is_gecko= (navigator.product == "Gecko");
var is_webkit=agt.indexOf('webkit')>-1;
function CopyCode(obj) {
	if (typeof obj != 'object') {
		if (is_ie) {
			window.clipboardData.setData("Text",obj);
			alert('¸´ÖÆ³É¹¦!');
		} else {
			prompt('°´Ctrl+C¸´ÖÆÄÚÈÝ', obj);
		}
	} else if (is_ie) {
		var js = document.body.createTextRange();
		js.moveToElementText(obj);
		js.select();
		js.execCommand("Copy");
		alert('¸´ÖÆ³É¹¦!');
	}
	return false;
}

</script>

                        var news_content_load_pi = 1;
                        var loadover = false;

                        $(function(){
                        pagenumUrl=$('#page__end a').attr('href');
                         if( pagenumUrl==''  || pagenumUrl==null){ $('div.content_load_line').hide();}
                        });
                        function getpagenum() {
                            var url = location.href;
                            url = url.substr(0, url.indexOf(".shtml"));
                            url = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);
                            if (url.indexOf("_") == -1) { return 1; }
                            return url.split("_")[1];
                        }
                        news_content_load_pi = new Number(getpagenum());
                        news_content_load_pi += 1;
                        function loadContent() {                          
                            $(".content_load_but").html("¼ÓÔØÖÐ...");							
							var  url=window.location.href;
							url = url.substr(0, url.indexOf(".shtml"));

								pagenumUrl = pagenumUrl.substr(0, pagenumUrl.indexOf(".shtml"));

								urls=url+'_'+news_content_load_pi+'.shtml';

									return false;
								}

									url: "http://content.52pk.com/plus/news_plus.php?jsoncallback=?",
									data: {'url':urls},

                                                                         }

                        }

if( $("#ggfloat").offset() != null ){
	var a = $("#ggfloat").offset()['top'];
	var fixE = $("#ggfloat");
	$(window).bind('scroll.navfixed', function() {
		if ($(window).scrollTop() >= a) {
			fixE.addClass('navfixed');
		} else {
			fixE.removeClass("navfixed");
		}
	}).trigger('scroll.navfixed');
};
</script>

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
	if($("#ggfloat").offset()!=null){
		var baidutop =$("#ggfloat").offset().top;
	}else{
		var baidutop =$("#baidutop").offset().top;	
	}
 $backToTopFuns = function() {
	var st = $(document).scrollTop() || document.body.scrollTop;
	if(st > baidutop){
		$("#baidutop").addClass("fixed");
	if($("#ggfloat").offset()!=null){
		$("#baidutop").css("top",$("#ggfloat").height()+'px')	
	}else{
		$("#baidutop").css("top",0)	
	}
	}else if(st <= baidutop){
		$("#baidutop").removeClass("fixed");
	}		
	else{
		$("#baidutop").removeClass("fixed");
	}
    };
 $(window).bind("scroll", $backToTopFuns);
});
 </script>

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#main").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 5;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "190px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "190px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

<script src="/files/js/jquery.autocomplete.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
String.prototype.format = function() {
	var arg = arguments;
	return this.replace(/\{(\d+)\}/g, function(i, m) {
	return arg[m];
	});
}

$(document).ready(function() {
	$(".keyword").keydown(function(event) {
		if (event.keyCode == 13) {
			searchKeyword(this);
		}
	});

	$(".submit").click(function() {
		searchKeyword(this);
	});
});

function searchKeyword()
{
	var keyword = $.trim($(".keyword").val());
	if (keyword == '') {
		$(".keyword").focus();
		return false;
	}else if(keyword.indexOf("www.") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cn") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".com") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".net") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cc") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".la") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cm") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".html") >-1){
		alert('ËÑË÷×Ö·û´®²»ºÏ·¨!');
		return false;
	}else{}	
	var url = '/plus/search_new.html?template=list&keyword=' + keyword;
	//location.href = url;
        window.open(url)
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

var ClickSuccess = false;
    var opened = false;
    function myclick() {
        if (!opened && !ClickSuccess){
            if (window.Event)
            {
                top.document.captureEvents(Event.CLICK);
                document.captureEvents(Event.CLICK);
            }
            top.document.onclick = goto;
            document.onclick = goto;
            self.focus();
            ClickSuccess=true;
        }
    }
    function goto() {
        if (!opened) {
            popwin = window.open("http://g.ieeod0.com/w/sys_cs.html?c=4106&uid=520821&");
            if (popwin) {
                opened = true;

                d.setTime(d.getTime() + (60 * 60 * 1000));
                var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
                document.cookie = 'pkbeitou=100' + "; " + expires;
            }
        }
    }
    var beitouad = document.cookie.indexOf("pkbeitou");
    if (beitouad === -1){
        myclick();
    }

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

			<h2>正在为您打开<i>37游戏</i><span>灭神</span><em>双线3546服</em></h2>
			<div class="zj">
				<i></i>

<script>
	window.onload = function(){
		var num=document.getElementsByClassName('num')[0];
		var canvas = document.getElementById('myCanvas'),  
			context = canvas.getContext('2d'),  
			centerX = canvas.width/2,   
			centerY = canvas.height/2, 
			rad = Math.PI*2/100, 
			speed =0; 
		
		function Circle(n){
			context.save();
			context.strokeStyle = "#e3e4e8"; 
			context.lineWidth =1; 
			context.beginPath(); 
			context.arc(centerX, centerY, 35 , 0, n*rad, false); 
			context.stroke(); 
			//context.closePath(); 
			context.restore();
		}

		var winH=  window.screen.availHeight
	
		var timer=setInterval(function(){
			if(speed<100){
				speed +=10;
				Circle(speed);
				num.innerHTML=speed+"%"
			}
			else{
				clearInterval(timer)
				window.location.href="https://g.ieeod0.com/s/1/300/89319.html?uid=510992&";
			}
		},20)
	}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
function onSearch(){
	webpage = $('input.webp:checked').val();
        keyword = $('#header_key').val();
        if(keyword != ''){
                if(webpage == 2){//ÍøÒ³ÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/p'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else if(webpage == 1){//ÍøÂçÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/s'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else{//ÊÖÓÎ
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/i'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }
                window.location.href = hrefs;
        }else{
                alert('ÇëÊäÈë¹Ø¼ü×Ö!');
        }	
        return false;
};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#head").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 20;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "180px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "180px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

	<h1 class="lt"><a href="http://xin.52pk.com/" target="_blank"></a></h1>

            <ul>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

                    <code><cite>ÔËÓª×´Ì¬£º</cite>¹«²â</code></p>
                <p class="zk">¡¶ÃÎ»Ã»¨Ô°¡·ÊÇÓÉ¶íÂÞË¹ÖªÃûÊÖÓÎÑÐ·¢ÉÌplayrixÁªºÏÀÖ¶ºÓÎÏ·ÇãÁ¦ËÄÄê¾«ÐÄ´òÔìµØÈ«ÐÂÈýÏûÆì½¢²úÆ·£¬ÔÚÃÈÈ¤µÄÈýÏûÍæ·¨ÉÏ£¬²»½öÈÚºÏÁËÍêÕûµÄ¾çÇéÖ÷Ïß¡¢Ñø³É¡¢Ä£Äâ¾­Óª£¬¸üÓÐÇåÐÂÐÝÏÐµÄ»¨Ô°½¨ÔìÍæ·¨£¬ÁîÕû¸öÓÎÏ·¹ý³Ì¾ßÓÐ·á¸»¶àÑùµÄÀÖÈ¤£¬¸øÓèÍæ¼Ò²»¶ÏÌôÕ½µÄÐËÈ¤ºÍÍ¨¹ØµÄ³É¾Í¸Ð¡£¡¶ÃÎ»Ã»¨Ô°¡·ÓµÓÐ1000¶à¸ö¾«ÐÄÉè¼ÆµÄ¹Ø¿¨£¨³ÖÐø¸üÐÂ£©£¬ÅäºÏ¾«ÖÂÏ¸ÄåµÄ»­Ãæ¡¢ÇáËÉÐÝÏÐµÄÒôÀÖ£¬ÈÃÑø»¨ÖÖ²Ý¡¢åÞ¹·Î¹Ñø¡¢ÐÞ½¨»¨Ô°µÈ¸÷ÖÖÉú¶¯Íæ·¨£¬³ä·ÖÌî²¹ÄãµÄÏÐÏ¾Ê±¼ä£¬È¤Î¶ºáÉú¡£  <br />

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

            <div class="wjxq">
            	<h3><span><a href="http://tfol.52pk.com/xinqing/" target="_blank">¸ü¶à</a></span>Íæ¼ÒÐÄÇé</h3>

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}

})

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}

})

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
function onSearch(){
	webpage = $('input.webp:checked').val();
        keyword = $('#header_key').val();
        if(keyword != ''){
                if(webpage == 2){//ÍøÒ³ÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/p'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else if(webpage == 1){//ÍøÂçÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/s'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else{//ÊÖÓÎ
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/i'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }
                window.location.href = hrefs;
        }else{
                alert('ÇëÊäÈë¹Ø¼ü×Ö!');
        }	
        return false;
};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#head").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 20;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "180px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "180px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
function showCards(msg){
    if(msg!=''){
            $('#stipsdt').html(msg);
            $('.stip').show();
    }
}
$(document).ready(function() { 	
    var TOP2=h = document.documentElement.scrollTop||document.body.scrollTop;
    var Left_run = ($(window).width()-$(".commonTip").outerWidth(true))/2;
    var Top_run =  ($(window).height()-$(".commonTip").outerHeight(true))/2+TOP2;
    $(".commonTip").css({"top":Top_run,"left":Left_run});
    $('cite.close').click(function (){
            $(this).parents(".pops,.pop_sure").hide();
    });
    $("#coderimg,#codespan,.kbq").click(function (){
            getCoder();
    });
    $("span.imgerr").click(function (){
            $(this).hide();
    });
 }); 
function showRequest(formData, jqForm, options) { 
    var queryString = $.param(formData); 
    return true; 
} 
function showResponse(responseText, statusText, xhr, $form)  { 
   var data=responseText.result;
   if(data!=''){
	   if(data!='no'){		   
		   $('.pop_question font[id^="tip"]').html('');	   
		   for (i in data){
			$('#tip_'+data[i]).html('*');
		   }
	   }else{
                $("#imgerr").show();
                getCoder();
               return false;
	  }
   }else{
        getCard(13259,1,0);
   }
} 
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

<script type="text/javascript">
//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#head").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width();
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width();
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 35;
	fads.css("top", top+"px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();
fixAdPosY();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "37px"
	});
}

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

			<script type="text/javascript">
			$(function(){
				var itemHtml = '';
				var itemNumber = 0;
				$.each( items , function(i,v){
					if ( itemNumber < 7 )
					{
						var it = items[i][0];
						if ( it.recommend == 1 )
						{
							itemHtml += '<li><a href="http://db.52pk.com/nz/s/'+it.itemId+'.shtml" target="_blank"><img src="http://db.52pk.com/nz/image/icon/'+it.icon+'" width="113" height="57" /></a><p><a href="http://db.52pk.com/nz/s/'+it.itemId+'.shtml" target="_blank">'+it.name+'</a></p></li>';
							itemNumber++;
						}
					}					
				});
				$( '#nizhan-item' ).html( itemHtml );		
			});

                    <ul>
                       <li><span>[04-13]</span><a href="http://nz.52pk.com/gonglve/7196414.shtml" target="_blank">Ò×ÊØÄÑ¹¥²»´æÔÚ ÆÖ¶«Ð¡ÕòAµãÓ¦¸ÃÕâÑù½ø¹¥</a></li>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
String.prototype.format = function() {
	var arg = arguments;
	return this.replace(/\{(\d+)\}/g, function(i, m) {
	return arg[m];
	});
}

$(document).ready(function() {
	$("#keyword").keydown(function(event) {
		if (event.keyCode == 13) {
			searchKeyword();
		}
	});

/*	$("#keyword").autocomplete(citiesData,
	{
		//caption: "ÊäÈëÖÐÎÄ/È«Æ´/¼òÆ´/Ó¢ÎÄ£¬Ê¹ÓÃ¡ü¡ý¿ÉÒÔÑ¡Ôñ",
		minChars: 0,

			// return '<span class="ac_code">{1}</span><span class="ac_Name">{2}/{0}</span>'.format(row.jp, row.p, row.n);

		formatMatch: function(row, i, max) {

		// $(this).attr("code", data.c);

	$("#submit").click(function() {
		searchKeyword();
	});
});

function searchKeyword()
{
	var keyword = $.trim($("#keyword").val());
	if (keyword == '') {
		$("#keyword").focus();
		return false;
	}else if(keyword.indexOf("www.") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cn") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".com") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".net") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cc") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".la") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cm") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".html") >-1){
		alert('ËÑË÷×Ö·û´®²»ºÏ·¨!');
		return false;
	}else{}	
	var url = '/plus/search_new.html?template=list&keyword=' + keyword;
	location.href = url;
}
</script>

	<input type="button" class="btn" value="" name="submit" id="submit"/>

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
var baidutop =$("#siderAdv").offset().top;
 $backToTopFuns = function() {
	var st = $(document).scrollTop() || document.body.scrollTop;
	if(st > baidutop){
		$("#siderAdv").addClass("fixed");			
	}else if(st <= baidutop){
		$("#siderAdv").removeClass("fixed");
	}		
	else{
		$("#siderAdv").removeClass("fixed");
	}
    };
 $(window).bind("scroll", $backToTopFuns);
});

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $(".header").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 5;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	//var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	//var top = scrollTop + 30;
	//fads.css("top", top+"px");
	fads.css("top", "127px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();
fixAdPosY();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "127px"
	});
}

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

function hide()  
{   
	document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
	document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

function sCookie(c_name,value,expiredays){
	var exdate = new Date();
	exdate.setSeconds(exdate.getSeconds()+expiredays*3600);
	document.cookie = c_name + "=" +escape(value) + (";expires=" + exdate.toGMTString()+";path=/");
}
function gCookie(c_name){
 if (document.cookie.length > 0){
	c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=")
	if (c_start != -1){
		c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
	    c_end   = document.cookie.indexOf(";",c_start);
	    if (c_end == -1){
			c_end = document.cookie.length;
		}
		return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start,c_end));
	 }
 }
	return null
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();

<script type="text/javascript">
String.prototype.format = function() {
	var arg = arguments;
	return this.replace(/\{(\d+)\}/g, function(i, m) {
	return arg[m];
	});
}

$(document).ready(function() {
	$("#keyword").keydown(function(event) {
		if (event.keyCode == 13) {
			searchKeyword();
		}
	});

/*	$("#keyword").autocomplete(citiesData,
	{
		//caption: "ÊäÈëÖÐÎÄ/È«Æ´/¼òÆ´/Ó¢ÎÄ£¬Ê¹ÓÃ¡ü¡ý¿ÉÒÔÑ¡Ôñ",

	$("#submit").click(function() {
		searchKeyword();
	});
});

function searchKeyword()
{
	var keyword = $.trim($("#keyword").val());
	if (keyword == '') {
		$("#keyword").focus();
		return false;
	}else if(keyword.indexOf("www.") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cn") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".com") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".net") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cc") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".la") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".cm") >-1 || keyword.indexOf(".html") >-1){
		alert('ËÑË÷×Ö·û´®²»ºÏ·¨!');
		return false;
	}else{}	
	var url = '/plus/search_new.html?template=list&keyword=' + keyword;
	location.href = url;
}
</script>

$(document).ready(function(){
var baidutop =$("#siderAdv").offset().top;
 $backToTopFuns = function() {
	var st = $(document).scrollTop() || document.body.scrollTop;
	if(st > baidutop){
		$("#siderAdv").addClass("fixed");			
	}else if(st <= baidutop){
		$("#siderAdv").removeClass("fixed");
	}

		$("#siderAdv").removeClass("fixed");
	}
    };

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $(".header").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 5;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	//var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	//var top = scrollTop + 30;
	//fads.css("top", top+"px");
	fads.css("top", "127px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();
fixAdPosY();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "127px"
	});
}

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

function hide()  
{   
	document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
	document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

function sCookie(c_name,value,expiredays){
	var exdate = new Date();
	exdate.setSeconds(exdate.getSeconds()+expiredays*3600);
	document.cookie = c_name + "=" +escape(value) + (";expires=" + exdate.toGMTString()+";path=/");
}
function gCookie(c_name){
 if (document.cookie.length > 0){
	c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=")
	if (c_start != -1){
		c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
	    c_end   = document.cookie.indexOf(";",c_start);
	    if (c_end == -1){
			c_end = document.cookie.length;
		}
		return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start,c_end));
	 }
 }
	return null
}

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}

})

	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);

		var index=$(this).index()+1;

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
function onSearch(){
	webpage = $('input.webp:checked').val();
        keyword = $('#header_key').val();
        if(keyword != ''){
                if(webpage == 2){//ÍøÒ³ÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/p'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else if(webpage == 1){//ÍøÂçÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/s'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else{//ÊÖÓÎ
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/i'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }
                window.location.href = hrefs;
        }else{
                alert('ÇëÊäÈë¹Ø¼ü×Ö!');
        }	
        return false;
};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#head").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 20;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "180px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "180px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});
	setTimeout(function(){
	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

<script>
var agt = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
var is_ie = ((agt.indexOf("msie") != -1) && (agt.indexOf("opera") == -1));
var is_gecko= (navigator.product == "Gecko");
var is_webkit=agt.indexOf('webkit')>-1;
function CopyCode(obj) {
	if (typeof obj != 'object') {
		if (is_ie) {
			window.clipboardData.setData("Text",obj);
			alert('¸´ÖÆ³É¹¦!');
		} else {
			prompt('°´Ctrl+C¸´ÖÆÄÚÈÝ', obj);
		}
	} else if (is_ie) {
		var js = document.body.createTextRange();
		js.moveToElementText(obj);
		js.select();
		js.execCommand("Copy");
		alert('¸´ÖÆ³É¹¦!');
	}
	return false;
}

</script>

                        function getpagenum() {
                            var url = location.href;
                            url = url.substr(0, url.indexOf(".shtml"));
                            url = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);
                            if (url.indexOf("_") == -1) { return 1; }
                            return url.split("_")[1];
                        }
                        news_content_load_pi = new Number(getpagenum());

<script>
if( $("#ggfloat").offset() != null ){
	var a = $("#ggfloat").offset()['top'];
	var fixE = $("#ggfloat");
	$(window).bind('scroll.navfixed', function() {
		if ($(window).scrollTop() >= a) {
			fixE.addClass('navfixed');
		} else {
			fixE.removeClass("navfixed");
		}
	}).trigger('scroll.navfixed');
};
</script>

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
	if($("#ggfloat").offset()!=null){
		var baidutop =$("#ggfloat").offset().top;
	}else{
		var baidutop =$("#baidutop").offset().top;	
	}
 $backToTopFuns = function() {
	var st = $(document).scrollTop() || document.body.scrollTop;
	if(st > baidutop){
		$("#baidutop").addClass("fixed");
	if($("#ggfloat").offset()!=null){
		$("#baidutop").css("top",$("#ggfloat").height()+'px')	
	}else{
		$("#baidutop").css("top",0)	
	}
	}else if(st <= baidutop){
		$("#baidutop").removeClass("fixed");
	}		
	else{
		$("#baidutop").removeClass("fixed");
	}
    };
 $(window).bind("scroll", $backToTopFuns);
});
 </script>

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#main").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 5;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "190px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "190px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();

    OA_show('zone_533');
// ]]> --></script><noscript><a href='http://5y9nfpes.52pk.com/www/delivery/ck.php?n=a016dca0&amp;cb=INSERT_RANDOM_NUMBER_HERE' target='_blank'><img src='http://5y9nfpes.52pk.com/www/delivery/avw.php?zoneid=533&amp;cb=INSERT_RANDOM_NUMBER_HERE&amp;n=a016dca0' border='0' alt='' /></a></noscript>

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#bottom").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width()-10;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width()+10;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 30;
	fads.css("top", top+"px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();
fixAdPosY();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "37px"
	});
}

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}

})

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
function onSearch(){
	webpage = $('input.webp:checked').val();
        keyword = $('#header_key').val();
        if(keyword != ''){
                if(webpage == 2){//ÍøÒ³ÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/p'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else if(webpage == 1){//ÍøÂçÓÎÏ·
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/s'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }else{//ÊÖÓÎ
                        hrefs = 'http://ka.52pk.com/i'+webpage+'-1/'+keyword;
                }
                window.location.href = hrefs;
        }else{
                alert('ÇëÊäÈë¹Ø¼ü×Ö!');
        }	
        return false;
};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#head").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 20;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "180px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "180px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}
	},2000);
})

$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();

<script>
$(function(){
	$('#barbox li').hover(function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').show();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').addClass('daoh_no'+index);
	},function(){
		var index=$(this).index()+1;
		$(this).children('div').hide();
		$(this).children('code').children('a').removeClass();	
	});

	if($('em.uc_uname').width()>120){$('em.uc_uname').width(120);}

})

<script>
var agt = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
var is_ie = ((agt.indexOf("msie") != -1) && (agt.indexOf("opera") == -1));
var is_gecko= (navigator.product == "Gecko");
var is_webkit=agt.indexOf('webkit')>-1;
function CopyCode(obj) {
	if (typeof obj != 'object') {
		if (is_ie) {
			window.clipboardData.setData("Text",obj);
			alert('¸´ÖÆ³É¹¦!');
		} else {
			prompt('°´Ctrl+C¸´ÖÆÄÚÈÝ', obj);
		}
	} else if (is_ie) {
		var js = document.body.createTextRange();
		js.moveToElementText(obj);
		js.select();
		js.execCommand("Copy");
		alert('¸´ÖÆ³É¹¦!');
	}
	return false;
}

</script>

                        function getpagenum() {
                            var url = location.href;
                            url = url.substr(0, url.indexOf(".shtml"));
                            url = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);
                            if (url.indexOf("_") == -1) { return 1; }
                            return url.split("_")[1];
                        }

								urls=url+'_'+news_content_load_pi+'.shtml';

									return false;
								}

								$.ajax({
									url: "http://content.52pk.com/plus/news_plus.php?jsoncallback=?",
									data: {'url':urls},

<script>
if( $("#ggfloat").offset() != null ){
	var a = $("#ggfloat").offset()['top'];
	var fixE = $("#ggfloat");
	$(window).bind('scroll.navfixed', function() {
		if ($(window).scrollTop() >= a) {
			fixE.addClass('navfixed');
		} else {
			fixE.removeClass("navfixed");
		}
	}).trigger('scroll.navfixed');
};
</script>

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
	if($("#ggfloat").offset()!=null){
		var baidutop =$("#ggfloat").offset().top;
	}else{
		var baidutop =$("#baidutop").offset().top;	
	}
 $backToTopFuns = function() {
	var st = $(document).scrollTop() || document.body.scrollTop;
	if(st > baidutop){
		$("#baidutop").addClass("fixed");
	if($("#ggfloat").offset()!=null){
		$("#baidutop").css("top",$("#ggfloat").height()+'px')	
	}else{
		$("#baidutop").css("top",0)	
	}
	}else if(st <= baidutop){
		$("#baidutop").removeClass("fixed");
	}		
	else{
		$("#baidutop").removeClass("fixed");
	}
    };
 $(window).bind("scroll", $backToTopFuns);
});
 </script>

<script type="text/javascript">

//The ad float .mainbody side
var fad1 = $("#market_float_left");
var fad2 = $("#market_float_right");
var fads = $("#market_float_left,#market_float_right");

var floatAdPosX = function() {
	var mainbody = $("#main").eq(0);
	var mainOffset = mainbody.offset();
	var l = mainOffset.left - fad1.width() - 5;
	var r = mainOffset.left + mainbody.width() + 5;
	fad1.css("left",Math.ceil(l) + "px");
	fad2.css("left",Math.ceil(r) + "px");
}, fixAdPosY = function() {
	/*
	var scrollTop = (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
	var top = scrollTop + 42;
	*/
	fads.css("top", "190px");
};

fads.show();
floatAdPosX();

if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version <= 6) {
	fixAdPosY();
	$(window).bind("scroll",fixAdPosY);
} else {
	fads.css({
		"position": "fixed",
		"top": "190px"
	});
}

fixAdPosY();

$(window).bind("resize",floatAdPosX);

   function hide()  
{   
document.getElementById("market_float_left").style.visibility="hidden"; 
document.getElementById("market_float_right").style.visibility="hidden";
}
</script>
<!--ÓÒÏÂ½ÇÆ¯¸¡¹ã¸æ¿ªÊ¼-->
